targets.expr: sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|md.+|dasd.+)", cluster="$cluster_kubelet", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster_kubelet", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", cluster="$cluster_dotdc"}[$__rate_interval])) by (namespace)
+ on (namespace)
(sum(rate(windows_container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container_id!="", cluster="$cluster_dotdc"}[$__rate_interval]) * on (container_id) group_left (container, pod, namespace) max by ( container, container_id, pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_info{container_id!="", cluster="$cluster_dotdc"}) OR kube_namespace_created{cluster="$cluster_dotdc"} * 0) by (namespace))

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="", cluster="$cluster_dotdc"}) by (namespace)
+ on (namespace)
(sum(windows_container_memory_usage_commit_bytes{container_id!="", cluster="$cluster_dotdc"} * on (container_id) group_left (container, pod, namespace) max by ( container, container_id, pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_info{container_id!="", cluster="$cluster_dotdc"}) OR kube_namespace_created{cluster="$cluster_dotdc"} * 0) by (namespace))
